name: Eqilipe
description:
- Control two entities at once, and keep them on the course.

- Keep them moving in a somewhat synchronized way to collect the most points.

- You get bonus multipliers the longer you keep both blobs moving.

- You have one safety barrier that will help you one time.

Controls

Blob 1

Keyboard: WASD

Gamepad: Left thumbstick or D-Pad

Blob 2

Keyboard: IJKL or arrows

Gamepad: Right  Thumbstick

Other

Switch Focus Blob:

Keyboard:  Space

Gamepad: L1, L2, R1, R2

Pause: Escape

Info:

All assets made for the jam except the font.

Font: Righteous

There still is some bugs, see if you can find them...

Enjoy!
